title: Patching error
body:
I keep getting this patching error 004 telling me to restart because it failed. So I restart and if I wait a few minutes it will pop up again. here's the reason I know its not on my end, the game still works. I am still able to play no problem its just really annoying having it pop up all the time between games and restart league.

yes I went through the trouble shooting, antivirus, connection, and all that but I've not had any problems until this latest league patch.

replies.body:
I launched league today and it there was an update which worked fine of course like always. Then once I logged in there was a scan which ran as usual no problems. Magically it also seems to have solved the error pop up issue because I left league running to see if the message would appear and it didn't. 
surprise a league patch fixed the client update error message issue and not something on my end.
I've been through the permissions guide, done all that. The problem is not with my end, as I said this has not been an issue until recent patch.

Ahhhhh that 004 error typically means that the program isn't able to access the files it needs due to permissions issues. You can use our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those setup if you're unsure, but let me know if those steps don't seem to help.
